sentences.en: ‘Two coffees, please.’ ‘Anything else?’ ‘No, thanks.’
sentences.cn: “请来两杯咖啡。”“还要别的吗？”“不要了，谢谢。

sentences.en: ‘What are you doing?’ ‘Waiting for you, what else?’
sentences.cn: “你在干什么？”“在等你呗，还能做什么？”

sentences.en: "Anything else?" Colum asked. Kathryn shook her head wearily.
sentences.cn: “还有别的吗？”科拉姆问。凯瑟琳疲惫地摇了摇头。

sentences.en: (= more than any other things ) she was seeking love.
sentences.cn: 她追求爱情胜过一切。

sentences.en: Allen, don't you dare go anywhere else, you hear?
sentences.cn: 艾伦，其他地方哪儿都不准去，听到了吗？

sentences.en: Ask somebody else to help you.
sentences.cn: 另请个人来帮帮你吧。

sentences.en: Be there on time or else!
sentences.cn: 无论如何一定要按时到

sentences.en: Despite his unconventional methods, he has inspired pupils more than anyone else.
sentences.cn: 尽管他的方法不同寻常，但他给予学生的激励比其他人都要多。

sentences.en: Have you any valuables anywhere else in the house?
sentences.cn: 你房子里其他地方还有贵重物品吗？

sentences.en: He told us to put it right, or else.
sentences.cn: 他让我们纠正错误，否则后果自负。

sentences.en: He was awake now, as was everyone else.
sentences.cn: 他现在已经醒了，其他人也都醒了。

sentences.en: I want to be honest, honest above everything else.
sentences.cn: 我想要做到诚实，一切以诚实为上。

sentences.en: I was set to shut out anyone else who came knocking.
sentences.cn: 其他任何人来敲门，我都决意将其拒之门外。

sentences.en: I’d like you to come, and anyone else who’s free.
sentences.cn: 我想请你过来，其他人有空也可以来。

sentences.en: If I can't make a living at painting, at least I can teach someone else to paint.
sentences.cn: 如果我不能以画画谋生的话，至少我能教别人画画。

sentences.en: Nobody else believed that they had tried to rub out the pope.
sentences.cn: 其他人都不相信他们试图杀死教皇。

sentences.en: Nobody else turned up till a quarter past ten.
sentences.cn: 直到10点一刻，其他人才露面。

sentences.en: One possible solution, if all else fails, is to take legal action.
sentences.cn: 如果其他办法都不行，还有一种可能是提起诉讼。

sentences.en: So, if we could just move onto something else?
sentences.cn: 那么我们可不可以干脆谈点别的？

sentences.en: Talking things out with someone else can be helpful.
sentences.cn: 跟别人讨论讨论把问题彻底谈开了可能会有用。

sentences.en: There’s something else I’d like to talk about as well.
sentences.cn: 我还有其他事情要谈一谈。

sentences.en: This design knocks everything else into a cocked hat.
sentences.cn: 这一设计令其他作品相形见绌。

sentences.en: Typically, the Norwegians were on the mountain two hours before anyone else.
sentences.cn: 像往常一样，挪威人比其他所有人都提前两小时进山。

sentences.en: We had nothing else to do on those long trips.
sentences.cn: 在那些漫长的旅途中我们别无他事可做。

sentences.en: Who else was at the party?
sentences.cn: 还有谁参加了聚会？

sentences.en: Why should I pay the penalty for somebody else's mistake?
sentences.cn: 为什么我要代人受过？

sentences.en: 中文例句：我还有其他事情要谈一谈。
sentences.cn: 英文例句：There’s something else I’d like to talk about as well.

phrases.tran_cn: 其他所有人；其他每个人
没有别的东西；没有别的事情
无论如何：无论任何困难情况

trans.tran_en: You use else after words such as "anywhere," "someone," and "what" to refer in a vague way to another person, place, or thing
besides or in addition to someone or something

trans.tran_cn: (Else)人名；(英)埃尔斯；(德)埃尔泽；(芬、丹)埃尔塞

trans.tran_en: besides or in addition to someone or something
